com.jmr.wrapper.common

Interface IProtocol

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Client, HttpServer, Server

    public interface IProtocol
    Networking Library IProtocol.java Purpose: Interface that is implemented by the TCP and UDP server and client, and also by the HttpServer. Provides methods that both need to have so that threads can have access to their information regardless of whether it is the server or client side.
    Version:
    1.0 7/19/2014
    Author:
    Jon R (Baseball435)
